Reviews.Title: works like new lol
Reviews.Author: Tesia  T Burton
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical at first to order this screen because I couldnt see it however it works great and it was the perfect one! Thx

Reviews.Author: Sarah Varn
Reviews.Content: I found this to be great!  It helped me out so much! Everywhere I went, they wanted to charge $130.00.  It was really easy change.  Oh and for the people who are guessing what version to get....all you have to do is take your phone apart and look on the back of the lcd screen.  Luckily I just guessed the right one.  Its great and it works =]

Reviews.Title: Malfunctioning Product
Reviews.Author: Cristel A Gomez
Reviews.Content: I received this product and it was not working.  Asked for it to be changed.  Was told that it was not possible as it came from China.  Asked for a refund, and no reply or refund to date.  I have wasted this money and still do not have something that worksDO NOT ORDER THIS!!

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Eliot Moss
Reviews.Content: This replacement screen for my Blackberry worked perfectly and installed fairly easily.  (The cable for connecting it is stuck down so that it folds properly, and it was slightly off in alignment to connect with my unit.  All I had to do was to peel the cable up and stick it back down in a slightly different place.)

Reviews.Title: Seriously..?
Reviews.Author: T. Tran
Reviews.Content: The screen looks like it's been used or not properly taken care of. It didn't fit quite right. I was very frustrated trying to put this on & it was a tight fit but once I got it installed & turned on my phone there was a giant crack across my screen.. What a waste of time, frustration & money. I should have listened to the bad reviews on this product.

Reviews.Title: ugh
Reviews.Author: Cherrie Williams
Reviews.Content: Product marked big and bold "tested" and when installed one big line across the screen.Its Defective!! So I paid for a broken screen! And please dont try to blame it on the person who installed it!

Reviews.Title: IT DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Orangel Briceño
Reviews.Content: These screens are not new. Buy 2 and with only a month of use, already it was damaged. Now I hope that the second one is not damaged. And since I them bought from Venezuela, it seems that I cannot do anything to have guarantee.

Reviews.Title: my amazon order
Reviews.Author: bjorn griffin
Reviews.Content: I recently order a LCD BLACKBERRY 9700/9780 SCREEN  PERFECT MATCH AND IS IN PROPER WORKING CONDITION . THE ITEM WAS DELIVERED WITHIN A MATTER OF DAYS . I M ACTUALLY ENJOYING THE USE OF MY NEW SCREEN

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Abelardo Perez
Reviews.Content: Screen in excellent condition, good packaging and include tools to change it on the computer. Widely recommended to replace the screen.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job well, although not the quality of the original
Reviews.Author: Eaton Hubbard
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and they arrived in good time and well protected.  Install of both was as installs go and they worked the first time.  You could only detect the difference in quality from the original when looking at it from a deep angle - you could see the fluorescent glare from the back light.  This does not really affect the everyday function.  It will obviously be evident in video playback but should not be an issue if your viewing angle is not too acute.  One of the phones started dimming out after the install and I initially thought it was the screen until I swapped them and the problem recurred, implicating the phone itself.  Quality okay for the price.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Bolivar
Reviews.Content: Congrats for you, the product comes to my hands in perfect status, and I have been used for myself for months and it works great !!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: ziggy benjamin
Reviews.Content: Just buy it I'm a phone tech I ordered this and it was worth every cent cant regret my choice cause it works fine another happy customer

Reviews.Title: hiqh quality
Reviews.Author: Jose Trujillo "JD Trujillo"
Reviews.Content: the screen works perfectly on the bberry phone.  I have no issue during the installation and is working perfectly.  Excellent

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: The product meets all my expectations and my experience of this purchase is exceptional. It is easier and safer to choose my articles.

Reviews.Title: Works!!!
Reviews.Author: Frank Johnson
Reviews.Content: It's not an exception product but it will allow you to used your cell. I bought 2 of these and only 1 work on the 9700.. The first broke almost immediately after installing it. Second one which is now installed is now as sharp as I expected but its better than using the phone as a paper weight!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Bold 3 LCD screen
Reviews.Author: Who Dah
Reviews.Content: The item was exactly what i needed.I'm very pleased with my purchase.I will be please to make other purchases with you all.Thanks you,

Reviews.Title: VALUATION
Reviews.Author: Nolymar Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: ESTE ES UN EXCELENTE PRODUCTO, ESTA ENCAJO DE MANERA PERFECTA, INCLUIA SUS PROPIOS DESTORNILLADORES PARA PODERLA INSTALAR, ESTA RECOMENDADO 100%

Reviews.Title: VENEZUELA
Reviews.Author: adrian piña
Reviews.Content: EXELENTE, EN MI BOLD 4 FUNCIONO DE MARAVILLA, SE LOS RECOMIENDO. SOY DE VENEZUELA. . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: lcd 9700
Reviews.Author: raul franco
Reviews.Content: buen articulo llego a la fecha sin ningún problema 100% confiable el vendedor,operacion realizada sin ningun tipo de incoveniente el producto llena mi perspectiva

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: GermanRosario
Reviews.Content: articulo en perfecto estad y de buena calidad 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100% 100%  recomendado

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Hendrick
Reviews.Content: Thanks that I got it real fast from the shipper and it is working perfectly well on my b b

Reviews.Title: Just a described
Reviews.Author: Kiel
Reviews.Content: Great my item was just as described working great  and they always deliver my goods on time at great price.

Reviews.Title: LCD Version
Reviews.Author: dave bielicki
Reviews.Content: The part was marked for 0004/111 but in assemble the LCD connector was not designed to lined up with the mating part on the phone.  Never used it.

Reviews.Title: NON OEM ORIGINAL
Reviews.Author: juan pablo matus olea
Reviews.Content: THE LCD DISPLAY IS NOT ORIGINAL AND ITS VERY SENSIBLE, LOW QUALITY PRODUCT VERY HIGH PRICE, PLEASE NO MORE LOW QUALITY PRODUCTS.

Reviews.Title: pregunta
Reviews.Author: vanessa
Reviews.Content: buenos dias esta panatlla le sirve al 9790 es tactil??? alguien le a colocado esta pantalla al 9790 espero pronta respuesta

Reviews.Title: wonderfull
Reviews.Author: Yulemar
Reviews.Content: it was the product i bought and it arrived in great condition. it worked correctly and it was easy to put on the phone, now i'm using it. recommended. thanks
